title: In Another Life
description: Police Detective Roger Mackay decides to make a sandwich for lunch and suddenly, he’s infatuated with a woman he saw reflected in a deli case. In Mackay’s own words, his quest for an epic sandwich leads to an adventure with this woman that leaves him questioning coincidence, time and ultimately, whether he can change what was and will be.Mackay’s story blends police work, a relationship and murdered friends with a chance for a new beginning or a dead end in the story of his life. Can Mackay change what should happen or is it even possible to change the path a person takes in life?Roger Mackay invites the reader along as he is forced to make choices that could mean life or death in a world he knows too well and not at all, In Another Life.
author: W.D. James
